ygData.subject: Re: Lizardman Scout Flute
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a quest item from an Ogre newbie quest, I believe.  No association to bards, that I know of.  Unless you can get into Ogre town, and live, give it to a
ygData.messageBody:
This is a quest item from an Ogre newbie quest, I believe. No association to bards, that I know of. Unless you can get into Ogre town, and live, give it to a newbie Ogre, and let him get a bit of XP from it. Oh, and I don't see this quest listed on any of the spoiler sites, but, when I once played an Ogre Shadow Knight, I do remember being given the quest. (Never got beyond Level 3 with that one, so it is a fairly low level quest, I assume)

MacGrough
16th Song Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers


-----Original Message-----
From: Jeremy <grandwazoo@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, September 10, 1999 1:11 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Lizardman Scout Flute


My friend gave me one of these but it is unequippable and vendors will not buy it. I assume it is a quest item, but I cannot find any quest that needs it. Has anyone else found this or knows what to do with it?
